meanings.definition: To make a hissing sound while frying or cooking.
meanings.sent1: The bacon was sizzling in the pan.
meanings.sent2: I love the sound of food sizzling on the grill.
meanings.sent3: The eggs were sizzling so loudly, they almost drowned out the radio.
meanings.sent4: As the steak sizzled on the barbecue, the aroma filled the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling of the vegetables in the wok was music to my ears.

meanings.sent1: The sizzling pavement burned my bare feet.
meanings.sent2: The desert sun was sizzling hot overhead.
meanings.sent3: The sizzling summer heat made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a sizzling fire, ready to explode.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling iron left a mark on the fabric.

meanings.sent1: The sizzling performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The sizzling new movie had everyone talking.
meanings.sent3: The sizzling party was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her sizzling dance moves stole the show.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling fireworks lit up the night sky.
